WeddingPackages.name: Small Wedding Package
WeddingPackages.subtitle: Intimate and elegant, perfect for cherished celebrations with your closest loved ones.
WeddingPackages.description: Create beautiful memories with an intimate celebration designed for your closest family and friends. Every detail thoughtfully curated to make your special day unforgettable.
includes: Church/Ceremony: Seating styling for up to 12 pews
Venue: Bridal table (up to 3 m) adorned with 6–10 floral arrangements

WeddingPackages.name: Standard Wedding Package
WeddingPackages.subtitle: Elegant and refined, perfect for medium-sized weddings or larger venues.
WeddingPackages.description: A perfect balance of elegance and sophistication for medium-sized celebrations. Create timeless memories with refined styling and beautiful floral arrangements throughout your venue.
includes: Venue: Bridal table (up to 5 m) with 8–10 floral arrangements
4–10 centrepieces for family or long tables

WeddingPackages.name: Luxury Wedding Package
WeddingPackages.subtitle: Lavish and unforgettable, designed to create breathtaking moments.
WeddingPackages.description: Experience the pinnacle of wedding elegance with our luxury package. Every space of your wedding day transformed into a breathtaking celebration of your love story.
includes: Church/Ceremony: Styling for up to 20 pews

WeddingPackages.name: Bespoke Wedding Package
WeddingPackages.subtitle: The ultimate in romance and luxury, designed entirely around your dreams.
WeddingPackages.description: Your wedding, your way. Every detail, every colour, every element curated to create a wedding as unique as your love story. This is where dreams become reality.
includes: Bride & Groom Houses: Custom draping (8–12 m)
Arches with up to 5 floral arrangements per house
Entry carpet and outdoor décor perfectly matching your theme
Every detail crafted to your wishes, for a truly one-of-a-kind celebration
addOns: Sky is the limit - any custom element you can dream of
